  (Rule: A maximum of one cross-court kill is allowed per rally.)

  (Rule: Drive: all drives' first bounces must land behind the T-line. Drop:...)
• 3 min: Drill: Half-Court: Alley Game with One Volley Cross (Forehand Drill) (Forehand)
  (Rule: All straight shots must land in the alley. A maximum of one volley...)
• Rest: 1.5 min

### Activity Block 5 ###

  (Rule: All straight shots must land in the alley. A maximum of one volley...)
• 3 min: Drill: Boast-Cross-Drive: Boast-Cross-Drive Extra Drive (Backhand Drill) (Forehand)
  (Rule: All cross-court shots and drives must have their first bounce land...)
• Rest: 1.5 min

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
End of session.

  (Rule: All cross lob shots and volley drives must have their first bounce...)
• 3 min: Drill: Boast-Cross-Drive: Boast-Cross-Drive With Kills Allowed (Backhand Drill) (Backhand)
  (Rule: For the cross-court and drive shots, the second bounce of the ball...)
• Rest: 1.5 min

### Activity Block 5 ###
• 3 min: Drill: Drop-Drive: Drop - Any Straight Drive (Backhand Drill) (Backhand)
  (Rule: The second bounce of all returning shots (drives/lobs) must land...)
• 3 min: Drill: Boast-Cross-Drive: Boast-Cross-Drive With Counter Drops (Backhand Drill) (Backhand)
  (Rule: Cross & Drive: Every cross-court shot and the subsequent drive...)
• Rest: 1.5 min

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
End of session.

  (Rule: All shots excluding the boast must land behind the T-line.)

### Activity Block 4 ###
